Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI doesnt know the criteria or the perspective of the marker to provide suggestions that I would actively incorporate into my work. It is for me to review and see if I like the feedback or not. My lecturer I would take onbaord all feedback as they are the SME and are viewing it from the point of the assignment task.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt my teachers feedback was perosnalised and relevant. AI I felt was generic and may not be specific to the specific uni assignment. I value the lecturer feedback more.
